title.memo: Supercomputers have large appetites for electricity and cooling, but smarter design and support strategies are making even the largest of these simulation powerhouses more sustainable.  Read more about how LANL and the supercomputing community are responding to the need for greater sustainability, while still pushing the performance envelope.

slides.title: Green Destiny
slides.header: In 2003, sustainable computing was still a novel concept, but LANL computer scientists Wu-chun Feng, Eric Weigle, and Michael Warren were ahead of the curve.
